title: Sir, May I Interest You In A Bordeaux Trend 9/17: Lil Nas X, No Vaseline, Intuit Dome, 'No Time To Die', Zone of Death, Laura Loomer
itunes:title: Sir, May I Interest You In A Bordeaux Trend 9/17: Lil Nas X, No Vaseline, Intuit Dome, 'No Time To Die', Zone of Death, Laura Loomer
description:
In this edition of Sir, May I Interest You In A Bordeaux Trend, Jack and Miles discuss Lil Nas X's debut album, the greatest diss tracks of all time, the new and completely unneccesary home for the L.A. Clippers, the new James Bond movie, the 'Zone of Death' and Gabby Petito, and Laura Loomer's dreams coming true.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
